title: is there a lost and found in pes ec campus
content: i lost my hostel keys and apparently some teacher found it in mechanical building but idk which teacher is there a place where he could have submitted it

comments.body: my roommate lost his keys once and found them in the lost and found. I don't know where it is exactly but ig it's in reception.
you can ask it at the reception. the lost and found room is beside the union bank atm in ground floor
